channel.title: Mr Staker is a blockchain infrastructure provider on
channel.description: Recent content in Mr Staker is a blockchain infrastructure provider on

item.title: Pricing
item.description: Pricing Delegate Elrond EGLD 10%fee Delegate from 1 EGLD Fee charged from network reward 10 days unbinding period Coming in Phase 4 Validator as a Service Monthly £100/node/mo No management fee for 1st month Pricing for management services No long term commitment Coming soon Validator as a Service Yearly £1000/node/yr No management fee for 1st month Pricing for management services 20% discount v monthly pricing Coming soon For VaaS (Validator as a Service) hosting fees also apply.
